<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1/playlists/{id}/sync"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Trigger synchronization of playlist with YouTube

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"description":"Playlist ID"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
